alert.note: Alert for Mecosta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 11 at 12:33PM EDT until May 11 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Michigan, including the following county, Mecosta. * WHEN...Until 645 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1231 PM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Rainfall rates from the slow moving thunderstorm impacting the region were likely topping 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mecosta, Canadian Lakes, Remus, Barryton, Rodney, Chippewa Lake, Sylvester and Altona. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
